name: airresistanceindicator
description: calculates how much energy it takes to push your vehicle through the air
author: Simon Vogensen <vogensen@gmail.com>

scripts.build: npm run build:scripts -s && npm run build:styles -s && npm run build:markup -s && npm run build:images -s && npm run build:vendor -s
scripts.build:scripts-prod: browserify -d assets/scripts/main.js -p [minifyify --compressPath . --map main.js.map --output dist/main.js.map] | hashmark -n dist/main.js -s -l 8 -m assets.json 'dist/{name}{hash}{ext}'
scripts.build:scripts: browserify -d assets/scripts/main.js | hashmark -n dist/main.js -s -l 8 -m assets.json 'dist/{name}{hash}{ext}' && npm run build:replacekeywords
scripts.build:styles: stylus assets/styles/main-day.styl -m -o dist/ && stylus assets/styles/main-night.styl -m -o dist/ && hashmark -s -l 8 -m assets.json dist/main-day.css 'dist/{name}{hash}{ext}' && hashmark -s -l 8 -m assets.json dist/main-night.css 'dist/{name}{hash}{ext}'
scripts.build:markup: cp assets/markup/*.html dist/ && jade assets/markup/index.jade --pretty --obj assets.json -o dist
scripts.build:vendor: cp node_modules/progressbar.js/dist/progressbar.min.js dist/ && cp node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js dist/ && cp node_modules/tether/dist/js/tether.min.js dist/ && cp node_modules/bootstrap-switch/dist/js/bootstrap-switch.min.js dist/ && cp node_modules/bootstrap-switch/dist/css/bootstrap3/bootstrap-switch.min.css dist/ && cp vendor/firebase-bower-2.4.1/firebase.js dist/ && cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.min.js dist/ && cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css dist/ && mkdir dist/font-awesome && cp -R node_modules/font-awesome/css dist/font-awesome && cp -R node_modules/font-awesome/fonts dist/font-awesome
scripts.dev: npm run open:dev -s & parallelshell "npm run live-reload -s" "npm run serve -s" "npm run watch -s"
